title: Nadia Sawalha, 54, poses defiantly in TWO bras (wearing one around her WAIST)
text:
Nadia Sawalha took to Instagram on Wednesday to pose in her bra - sporting a second one around her waist!

The Loose Women star, 54, larked around in the candid image, snapped by her pal, as she posed defiantly in a bedroom in just the bras and a pair of jeans.

Looking merry, the former-actress held her hands on her hips and stuck her pose, captioning the image: 'Don’t you just love those mates who always capture you at your best moments!!

'Don’t you just love those mates who always capture you at your best moments!' Nadia Sawalha took to Instagram on Wednesday to pose in her bra - sporting a second one around her waist

'How grey is that bra?? Are you a grey bra woman? Come on confess? How rubbish is your bra? Do you ever wear two like I am... for some reason?!!'

Nadia was out and about with her daughters Maddie, 16, and Kiki-Bee, 12, at the premiere of Knives Out, at the 63rd BFI London Film Festival last week.

Brushing aside the ongoing feud that is apparently taking place between her and her fellow actress sister, Julia, the ITV star showed that things were far from fractious between her own girls.

Joined by husband Mark Adderley, the Loose Women panellist was all smiles as she posed on the red carpet outside the Odeon Luxe Leicester Square with her brood.

Family: Nadia stepped out with her daughters Maddie, 16, and Kiki-Bee, 12, to attend the premiere of Knives Out, held at London's the Odeon Luxe Leicester Square last week

Nadia stepped out in eye-catching style for the event, donning a black top and matching tracksuit bottoms with a neon pink coat and box fresh white tennis shoes.

Wearing her honey brown tresses in tousled curls, the south London native further glammed up her look with oversized gold hoop earrings and light makeup.

Maddie displayed her own flair for fashion in a red fluffy jacket, which she teamed with a matching dress, striped tights and chunky heavy duty boots.

Smiles: Joined by husband Mark Adderley, the Loose Women panellist was all smiles as she posed on the red carpet with her brood at the event, part of the 63rd BFI London Film Festival

Also standing tall in similar footwear to her sister's, Kiki-Bee opted for a black dress while a midnight blue hoodie helped stave off the evening chill.

Nadia's husband Mark, to whom the TV personality has been married since 2002, cut a dapper figure in a black blazer over a matching shirt, which he teamed with jeans.

Directed by Rian Johnson, Knives Out is described as a whodunnit mystery film, which features a star-studded ensemble cast, including Daniel Craig, Chris Evans, Jamie Lee Curtis, Don Johnson, Toni Collette, and Katherine Langford.

Nadia's family outing to the event comes several weeks after the former EastEnders star's bitter fallout with her actress sister Julia, 51, was brought to the fore.

Catching the eye: Nadia stepped out in eye-catching style for the event, donning a black top and matching tracksuit bottoms with a neon pink coat and box fresh white tennis shoes

In late August, Absolutely Fabulous star Julia claimed the Loose Women panellist had 'destroyed' their family.

The actress hit out at Nadia in a shock Twitter rant, accusing her sister of spouting 'lies and rubbish' on television in order to garner 'sympathy and attention'.

She has since 'liked' a number of tweets from people who weighed in on the feud, with one writing: 'Leave her [Nadia] to be bitter on TV and carry on with your life behind the scenes, knowing what the truth is!'

Julia also showed her support for a tweet that read: 'What I've learnt with family is you can never compete with liars, they just don't have moral controls and trample over you! You're in charge of your life and you know your truth.'

Controversy: Nadia's family outing comes several weeks after her sister Julia Sawalha, 51, claimed the Loose Women host 'destroyed' their family. Pictured together in 1999

Julia fired back just two days after Nadia discussed her 'really volatile relationship' with her younger sibling on Monday's edition of Loose Women, alleging they go through phases where they don't speak.

The actress responded on the micro-blogging site, accusing her sister of keeping their six-year feud going for publicity.

She tweeted: 'So tired of #nadiasawalha talking about our'stormy' relationship which she created.

'I've kept my privacy for 6 years to protect my family, whilst she talks lies& rubbish. You have destroyed our family so don't sit on TV with your fake tears to gain sympathy & attention [sic].'
description: Nadia Sawalha took to Instagram on Wednesday to pose in her bra - sporting a second one around her waist!
